I'm breaking into the tech industry with a passion for front-end web development and coding beautiful user interfaces. üíª My dream has always been to live in harmony: remain entirely obssessed with an ever-building career full of learning üë®‚Äçüíª while maintaining a peaceful hobby farm in the Nova Scotia forest üå≤üå≥üå≤ Developing has become a great love very quickly :)

projects.title: Hyrule Compendium
projects.description: IN PROGRESS! A SPA which allows the user to browse all of the interactive items found in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild using a public API. My first time building an app dedicated to displaying data from an API - time to have fun with React!

projects.title: Petome
projects.description: The most fun I've had creating a web app (so far). I deepened my understanding of React state and hooks, as well as API calls. I'm proud of the clean, simple interface and the seamlessness of play- but there's still a long way to go with this one!

projects.title: PhotoLabs
projects.description: My first SPA using React which mimics a very simple Instagram. I learned a lot about React state and using components to create a clean, simple interface using modals. I also learned a lot about the importance of planning and wireframing before diving into code, and even experienced my first love-hate relationship with a button.

projects.title: DevvyDuckQuacks(DDQ)
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on during my diploma. I had to work with a teammate to build a functioning resource wall (ie Pinterest) under a timecrunch deadline of one week. I've learned a lot about communicating since then!
